pageContext.claim: “The Center for Effective Lawmaking named Joe Donnelly the least effective Democrat lawmaker in the United States Senate.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is cherry-picking this statistic. According to a narrow definition, Donnelly has never sponsored a bill that became a law during his first term in the Senate. But he was cosponsor or original co-sponsor of a number of bills that did become law, sometimes as an amendment to a broader bill.
